answers.answer: I should also add that I found out I had a blood sugar level of 410 and am going to get tested for diabetes this weekend.  Could this possibly be the cause?

question: My testicles have been sore for about 2 weeks now.  I received unprotected oral sex about 2-3 months before this started and thought this might be the cause.  I went to the doctor and he said it didn't come from tha.  Anyway, I tyested negative for chlamydia and gonnorhea.  I took the cipro prescribed but not the zithro because that was expensive and I didnLt want to pay for that unless I tested positive.  The pain is better, but never went away.  What else may cause this?
title: sore testicles
